ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, was just looking for confimation first.  I can pretty much guarantee that they d fix this.  Here s why:  losing a battle?  pretty sure that you re going
ygData.messageBody:
Well, was just looking for confimation first. I can pretty much guarantee
that they'd fix this. Here's why: losing a battle? pretty sure that
you're going to die? Fire up the song and kill yourself - this way you have
been killed by a PC and don't lose experience. I discovered this by mistake
by trying to finish off a kobold with this song when we were both at about a
bubble of life.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Lange, Stephen [mailto:SLANGE@...]
Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 3:50 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 43 Song


From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>

That might be something to include in your message.

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 2:25 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Level 43 Song


From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

Has anyone else noticed that Denon's Desperate Dirge still hurts us when we
cast it?
Didn't I read somewhere that this got fixed in one of the recent patches, or
am I hallucinating?


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 44 Bard
Erollisi Marr
